price: (Abari kumwe na we) baravuga bati “Turahiye ku izina rya Allah ko mu by’ukuri ukiri mu makosa yawe ya kera (yo gukunda Yusufu no kutamwibagirwa).”
arabic: قَالُواْ تَٱللَّهِ إِنَّكَ لَفِي ضَلَٰلِكَ ٱلۡقَدِيمِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālū tal-lahi innaka lafī ḍalālika al-qadīmi
